trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'azione del linguaggio di markup sintesi della voce (SSML) da intraprendere durante il rendering di un dato oggetto <see langword="TextFragment" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> rappresenta le richieste per la manutenzione di un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Le azioni corrispondono agli elementi nella specifica SSML e sono implementate nel testo restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> proprietà in un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore associato a un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Processing of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: L'elaborazione del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà viene gestita da un riconoscimento vocale sintetizza l'implementazione del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> metodo in una classe derivata da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente fa parte di un'implementazione di sintesi vocale personalizzato che eredita da <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>e tramite l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Riceve una matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze e crea una nuova matrice di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze deve essere passato il `Speak` metodo su un motore di sintesi sottostante.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is Speak, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valore di enumerazione da trovato dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà di ogni <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanza è Speak, l'implementazione

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms nel testo da leggere.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> event type, an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> proprietà il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfacce fornite per il supporto di implementazione di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> il tipo di evento, che viene creato un evento per guidare un indicatore di avanzamento sintetizzatore.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: Viene quindi chiamato il motore di rendering vocale con modificato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matrice.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Indica che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> deve essere utilizzato come contenuto di un segnalibro.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al tag XML `<mark>` nella specifica SSML.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Indica che non è stata determinata alcuna azione dall'input di SSML.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto associato <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> è un tag XML sconosciuto non fa parte dello standard SSML.

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: L'input che può essere interpretato o ignorato a discrezione del motore di sintesi.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Richiede che il testo <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> di input venga interpretato come fonemi.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Pronuncia esatto specificata da di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> membro del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al tag XML `<Phoneme>` nella specifica SSML.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: Indica che un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> non contiene alcun testo di cui eseguire il rendering come input vocale.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Durata di inattività specificata da di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> membro di he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> proprietà <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> istanze.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al tag XML `<Silence>` nella specifica SSML.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: Richiede che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> associato venga elaborato e pronunciato.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>,
trans-unit.target: Questo è il valore predefinito di <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> per un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>,

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al tag XML `<speak>` nella specifica SSML

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> through its <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak" /> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: Indica che i valori di testo forniti da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> tramite la relativa proprietà <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak" /> devono essere sintetizzati come singoli caratteri.

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: Il rendering include segni di punteggiatura, diversi da spazi vuoti, come testo alfanumerici.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio tre associato un frammento di testo "word"!

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: deve essere synthsized in "w o r punto esclamativo d".

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Indica lo stato del paragrafo.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
Corrisponde al tag XML `

` nella specifica SSML

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: Indica l'inizio della frase.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corrisponde al tag XML `<s>` nella specifica SSML
